title: Beautiful For Ever!: The Extraordinary Life and Trial of Madame Rachel
itunes:title: Beautiful For Ever!: The Extraordinary Life and Trial of Madame Rachel
description:
Fashion history and true crime come together this week as we explore a scandal of the 1860s involving a British cosmetics maven who bilked her clients out of fortunes with the promise to halt the aging process and make them beautful forever.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: dressed, dressed podcast, fashion history, true crime, Madam Rachel, Rachel Leverson, Rachel Levison, Rachel Leveison
